content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 5, Milan 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 5, Milan 1.
Offside, Manchester City. Greg Leigh tries a through ball, but Emyr Huws is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Riccardo Saponara (Milan) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Michael Agazzi.
Gaël Clichy (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
